title: A new question!
author: JGray
text:
The alternative title for this page is 'Lesbian Horror Kisses'.

I'm pretty excited about this action sequence. It has been dynamic and unconventional. Sarrah's done a great job penciling, inking, and coloring it!

Now, I have another question for you! Today, I'm asking, who is your favorite MotA character and why?

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: Theresa. Looking forward to watching her start to figure out who she is now.

replies.author: Mitaukano*Guest*
replies.text: Oh man such a hard choice! I love Chrys, Theresa, Mandrake and William so much.

replies.author: Nightlyre*Guest*
replies.text: William.C'mon, he defeated a freakin' sentient black hole. He rules.

replies.author: Pseudo*Guest*
replies.text: I would like to see more of the surgeon.  It seems such a sad little machine intelligence; scheduled for destruction despite performing so well, betraying it's larger self and reaching out to desperate enemies, and now untrusted and disliked by everyone.  It deserves a few pages of plot and a chance to further redeem itself.

replies.author: adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Mandrake. I have a weakness for purple-skinned image-speaking faerie type folk....That and she's just so CUTE!

replies.author: Mei*Guest*
replies.text: Mandrake. can't beat floating picture messages. plus, she flies. can william to that? hm?

replies.author: salaheg*Guest*
replies.text: My Favorite is Theresa she's the most realistic character.

replies.author: TC*Guest*
replies.text:
I think the title needed a few more Y's, to give it that George Takei-esque style of awesome.

And I love how the rainbow was the confirmation pic.

Now I wonder about the male horror.  rofl

replies.author: adamas*Guest*
replies.text: TC , I can just see his reaction. "I must do WHAT?!" :D
